tool_description: Calculates total macronutrients (protein, carbohydrates, fats) and calories for a complete recipe based on individual ingredient nutritional profiles.

ingredient_names.description: List of ingredient names in the recipe

quantities_g.description: Quantities in grams for each ingredient

protein_per_100g.description: Protein grams per 100g for each ingredient

carbs_per_100g.description: Carbohydrate grams per 100g for each ingredient

fat_per_100g.description: Fat grams per 100g for each ingredient

fiber_per_100g.description: Fiber grams per 100g for each ingredient

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All nutritional arrays must have the same length as ingredient_names array.
Invalid nutritional values: All nutritional values must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid quantities: All ingredient quantities must be positive numbers greater than 0.
Maximum ingredients exceeded: Recipe cannot contain more than 50 ingredients for calculation.
Empty ingredient list: At least one ingredient must be provided for calculation.
usage: Provide ingredient_names, quantities_g, and nutritional values per 100g for each ingredient. Returns total macronutrient content and calorie breakdown for the entire recipe.

total_calories.description: Total calories for the entire recipe
